items.content_html: A lightweight IoT server implementation for managing and monitoring smart devices with MQTT support.
items.title: fuloid/simple-iot-server: A lightweight IoT server implementation for managing and monitoring smart devices with MQTT support.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

items.content_html: A lightweight, keyboard-friendly media player for macOS ‚Äî inspired by Media Player Classic. This player offers a rich set of keyboard shortcuts for enhanced control and accessibility.
items.title: piro0919/mac-classic-player:       A lightweight, keyboard-friendly media player for macOS ‚Äî inspired by Media Player Classic. This player offers a rich set of keyboard shortcuts for enhanced control and accessibility.

items.content_html: Modern, lightweight HTTP client for JavaScript, with handy tools for working with requests and responses.
items.title: vladstsk/httio: Modern, lightweight HTTP client for JavaScript, with handy tools for working with requests and responses.

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based Flappy Bird clone crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Guide the bird through a series of pipes by clicking or pressing the spacebar. This project serves as a practical introduction to game development concepts such as animations, collision detection, and responsive design using vanilla web technologies.
items.title: pranati2507/Flappy_Bird_Game: A lightweight, browser-based Flappy Bird clone crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Guide the bird through a series of pipes by clicking or pressing the spacebar. This project serves as a practical introduction to game development concepts such as animations, collision detection, and responsive design using vanilla web technologies.

items.content_html: A lightweight Typescript library that interacts with Gotenberg's different modules to convert a variety of document formats to PDF files.
items.title: cherfia/chromiumly: A lightweight Typescript library that interacts with Gotenberg's different modules to convert a variety of document formats to PDF files.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable Dialog Panel web component for creating accessible and responsive modal dialogs.
items.title: magic-spells/dialog-panel: A lightweight, customizable Dialog Panel web component for creating accessible and responsive modal dialogs.

items.content_html: LupineApi is a fast, lightweight, and flexible node.js based server, working with LupineJs to provide SSR and modern JavaScript features for web applications and APIs.
items.title: uuware/lupine.api: LupineApi is a fast, lightweight, and flexible node.js based server, working with LupineJs to provide SSR and modern JavaScript features for web applications and APIs.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use ‚Äî perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.
items.title: Yanny24211/pixel-draw: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use ‚Äî perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.

items.content_html: A lightweight (~5k) library for control, styling and themes.
items.title: hlop3z/xkin: A lightweight (~5k) library for control, styling and themes.

items.content_html: Convert images to WebP format directly in your browser using this lightweight React app. Perfect for optimizing your portfolio images for web performance.
items.title: abhisheksmandal/webp-image-converter: Convert images to WebP format directly in your browser using this lightweight React app. Perfect for optimizing your portfolio images for web performance.

items.content_html: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.
items.title: dipeshmurmu2005/itstoaster: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.

items.content_html: A lightweight miniprogram framework
items.title: miniapp-tool/mptool: A lightweight miniprogram framework

items.content_html: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
items.title: SaisumanthT/RSVP-TeamManager: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible library for working with Deno KV. It simplifies database interactions in Deno applications.
